attributes.action: Ensure that no Tax exemption be granted to the Madeleine McCann Fund.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition that no Tax Exemption be granted for the Public Limited Company known as "Madeleines Fund:Leaving no stone unturned Limited"
I was disturbed to see the objectives of this "Foundation" especially,
Para 3.1.3 To provide assistance, including financial assistance, to Madeleines family.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
